Notes.Text:
This update for libsndfile fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-4156: Fixed heap buffer overflow in flac_buffer_copy that 
could potentially lead to heap exploitation (bsc#1194006).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: An out-of-bounds read flaw was found in libsndfile's FLAC codec functionality. An attacker who is able to submit a specially crafted file (via tricking a user to open or otherwise) to an application linked with libsndfile and using the FLAC codec, could trigger an out-of-bounds read that would most likely cause a crash but could potentially leak memory information that could be used in further exploitation of other flaws.
